Title:
Bug  prediction  based   on  fine-grained    module
histories
Elements_risk_assessment:
Identify a module as buggy if the module contains regions that are created 
    in the bug-introducing commits, and are modified in the bug-fixing commits.
Summary:
developed a fine-grained version control system for Java, Historage. With this system, we target
    Java software and conduct fine-grained prediction with well-known historical metrics.
Outcome:
fine-grained (method-level) prediction outperforms coarse-grained (package
    and file levels) prediction when taking the efforts necessary to find bugs into account.
